footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Sucrose | Update Date: 08/07/2022 | Editor: SirDerpyHerp#7903

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers__
One of the best supporting weapons in the game, giving a whole 48% ATK to one of your teammates.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Sacrificial Fragments__
Used as an Elemental Mastery stat stick when you already have another Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers user in the team, the extra Elemental Skill is useful for grouping enemies
__Magic Guide__
A 3* Elemental Mastery stat stick, not much else to it. Use it if you don't have Sacrificial and already have a Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers user.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Elemental Mastery |<circlet>  Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Astable Anemohypostatsis Creation - 6308
**2)** Elemental Burst: Forbidden Creation - Isomer Type II
**3)** Normal Attack: Wind Spirit Creation

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Sucrose only needs to be levelled up to 60/70 to unlock her Ascension 4 Passive. Her talent levels can also be ignored.
4p Instructor should only be used early game or if you can't swirl your DPS's element like in a Hu Tao team without a 2nd Pyro character.

When used with Xiao, her artifact choice doesn't matter as much, you only need to use R5 Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers.
